Package eu.excitement.entailment.core.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BaseException
    The top-level abstract exception of the EXCITEMENT platform.
    ComponentException
    This is an exception caused within an entailment core component.
    ConfigurationException
    Interfaces of common configuration can throw exceptions of various kinds.
    DistanceComponentException
    Implementations of distance calculation components can throw this exception.
    EDAException
    Interfaces and implementations of EDAs can generate this type of exception.
    KnowledgeComponentException
    Implementations of knowledge components (lexical resource and syntactic resource) can raise this exception.
